task_description: Facing the building to your South-East (approx. 118°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to estimate the height of the building, but I can't see the top, so I will rotate my view upwards to see the full structure.
I can now see the top of the building and can count approximately 10 floors; assuming a standard floor height of 3 meters, the total height is about 30 meters.
